question: A landscaper works for 5 weeks every month and for 7 days every week. If he gets paid $80 every day, how much does he earn if he works for a year?
answer:
The landscaper works for 7 days every week and works for 5 weeks every month so he works for 7 days/week * 5 weeks/month = <<7*5=35>>35 days/month
If he earns $80 every day he then earns $80/day * 35 days/month = $<<80*35=2800>>2800/month
A year is equal to 12 months so every year he earns $2800/month * 12 months/year = $<<2800*12=33,600>>33,600
#### 33,600
